title: evening_vegetable_watering_manual
summary: Manual watering of vegetable crops during the evening at MaMeeFarm.
description: This image documents the evening watering of vegetable crops using a manual watering can. The activity took place at 17:20 local time as part of routine daily crop care operations at MaMeeFarm.
